actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to provide for expedited security screenings for members of the Armed Forces.
short_title: Risk-Based Security Screening for Members of the Armed Forces Act

summary.text: Risk-Based Security Screening for Members of the Armed Forces Act - Directs the Assistant Secretary of Homeland Security (Transportation Security Administration [TSA]) to develop and implement a plan for expedited security screening services for a uniformed Armed Forces member and, to the extent possible, accompanying family, if the member presents documentation indicating official orders for air transportation departing from a primary airport.

titles.title: Risk-Based Security Screening for Members of the Armed Forces Act
A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to provide for expedited security screenings for members of the Armed Forces.
